message.body: He is doing good. Glad it is over with but he is doing really good. Pretty much back to himself already.
I think k we will bring a stroller for the airport but will let you know.
Between stuff you brought over, outside and food mom is getting I think we are set.
He is doing good. Glad it is over with but he is doing really good. Pretty much back to himself already.
I think k we will bring a stroller for the airport but will let you know.
Between stuff you brought over, outside and food mom is getting I think we are set.
Baby monitor? We don't even use one but will need it in that giant house
The only monitor I have us at Elizabeth's. I will ask around
Glad he is doing well! No fun to get your manhood sliced :(
Haha. We can also bring ours home too
Do you let Ryland watch TV at all?
Sorry auto correct. Rylan
Yes and unfortunately he loves it.... We tried not to let Avery at his age but with Avery now it's impossible. He watches more than he should but usually
doesn't pay attention, mostly right when he wakes up while I finish getting their stuff ready and to have his formula before bed. He laughs at it & real
ly loves it :( ha ha kinda cute but don't want a couch potato!
Does cooper? I really don't mind a little bit, just don't want him watching too much!
Yeah. We let Cooper to a little. He loves it too. But I figure it's fine because he loves to be outside more. And does not get mad if you turn it off
Sometimes if he is really wound up before bed it calms him too. Or if Kristen needs to get ready.
Now he grabs the remote and says "show, show"
I think it's bad if its your babysitter but not if its just a little. Ha ha! He definitely talks more than rylan, he just grunts and points to the tv. Ma
ybe coop with help him with that!
They are going to be funny together. Especially with avery
She will be queen of the boys, she will love it! She's a good helper
Can't wait to see them together!
Cooper has seemed fine with his procedure but woke up every hour last night and then was awake from 4 until I left. Hope he is doing a little better tomorrow on the plane
Ugh usually the 2nd day after is the worst? Hope he feels better! Poor guy and parents. That's no fun!
He was running around just fine all day. His little bandage fell off before bed (it was supposed to) so maybe it is more sensitive now.
Maybe he over did it yesterday and was sore and tired. That's gotta hurt!
Hopefully today will be better!
Yep. He'll probably be fine.
Did he go right back to sleep or was he uncomfortable?
No wasn't go back easy.
Can't complain too much because it is one of the few sleepless nights for us. Def lucky in that regard.
So it hurt, poor guy. They try to tell you it doesn't hurt them but that's kind oa a sensitive little area!
Rylan sleeps really great now but the day he slept theough the night is the night Avery stopped...grrr It's sad though when you know it's because he hurts :(
Does cooper wear size 3 diapers? I can bring some on Saturday so you don't have to buy any, we have a ton!
Pretty sure he still does
I'm getting another shipment from amazon and have a ton so I can bring some!
Actually Kristen said he wears 4s. But we will just bring a few and see if the 3s fit.
Ok, I'm sure they can't be tight on his business right now either. We can check it out. He must be quite a bit bigger than Ty
Or ry
